title: Dilan
occurrences: Dilan
Dilan, I'm losing my patience.
What's her name? Ah, Dilan.
Within a week Dilan shall be in your bed.
we've come to ask for your daughter Dilan's hand in marriage to Mirkan.
Dilan is our firstborn. We've raised her till now.
Dilan may settle on the branch of a rose, or of a thornbush.
They want Dilan for Mirkan as a wife. Go to her and aks her what she thinks.
- What do you ask for your daughter? - For my daughter Dilan I demand 30 sheep.
Why isn't your sister Dilan sitting with you by the cow dung fire?
They gave Dilan to the orphan Mirkan.
Until I tell you to go to them to ask for Dilan's hand, be patient and wait.
- Without realizing I fell in love with Dilan. - But Patho Bey!
I know. You'll say that Dilan has been promised to Mirkan.
But I swear that dog hasn't even touched Dilan yet.
I'll just go to Mirkan now and tell him to give up Dilan. Ok?
For Dilan's hand I'll have to pay a huge dower.
With each day the wall between Dilan and myself is rising.
For Dilan, I'd give not only all my belongings, but also my life.
For Dilan I'd to anything, I'd even die for her.
I'll sacrifice everything for Dilan.
Dilan.
Dilan.
Dilan.
It is, Dilan.
Dilan.
Look here, Dilan.
This is the way of the word, my Dilan.
Dilan, my daughter.
What's the matter, Dilan?
Mirkan's horse and home shall be yours even before I'll possess Dilan.
And what's the fault of the little sparrow? What's poor Dilan's fault?
Who are Dilan and Mirkan to me?
Dilan in Mirkan, Patho Bey in his cock.
I'll revenge the wrong done to Dilan and Mirkan.
What's the matter, Dilan?
If my mother had handled this affair, I'd have understood. But how could Dilan do it?
